title: ASUSâ€™ new Zenbook and Vivobook laptops have 120Hz OLED displays
content:
ASUS has introduced an array of new laptops during its “The Pinnacle of Performance” event, mostly focusing on its Zenbook and Vivobook lines. The new laptops introduced all come with the latest processors from AMD and Intel, as well as OLED displays across the board, many of them featuring a high 120Hz refresh rate. The

The post ASUS’ new Zenbook and Vivobook laptops have 120Hz OLED displays appeared first on XDA.
description: ASUS has unleashed a flurry of new premium and creator laptops, most featuring OLED displays with a 120Hz refresh rate and 2.8K resolution.
